description: This Python source file defines a test case class DnfSelftest for runtime testing of DNF package manager behavior in the OEQA (OpenEmbedded Automated QA) framework. It includes setup and teardown methods, and a specific test 'test_verify_package_feeds' that checks repository configuration and package information.

classes.name: DnfSelftest
classes.description: A test class inheriting from DnfTest that performs runtime checks related to dnf repositories and package information, including setup and cleanup of a temporary directory and HTTP server.

methods.name: setUpClass(cls)
methods.description: Class method that creates a temporary directory and starts an HTTPService for repository testing.

methods.name: tearDownClass(cls)
methods.description: Class method that stops the HTTPService and cleans up the temporary directory.

methods.name: test_verify_package_feeds(self)
methods.description: Test method that verifies the correct setting of PACKAGE_FEED_URIS, patches configuration files, and checks that 'dnf' commands behave as expected by analyzing their output.
